title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Designing CSCL Assessments Based on Collaborative Learning Scripts

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic arithmetic operations and team collaboration experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more evaluation items suitable for collaborative learning scripts.
The assessment process can be visualized using tools in accordance with the IMS Learning Design standard
Project outcomes can be measured by combining peer assessment, self-assessment, and observational evaluation techniques
An assessment system can be established to collect and analyze team interaction data in mathematical problem-solving projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
